H0.text: In the Billy Bunter stories, what is the surname of Bunter’s form teacher. Grimstone

H1.text: In the Billy Bunter stories, what is the surname of Bunter’s form teacher. Fletcher

H2.text: In the Billy Bunter stories, what is the surname of Bunter’s form teacher. Hastings

H3.text: In the Billy Bunter stories, what is the surname of Bunter’s form teacher. QUELCH

A4.text: Cora Quelch is the niece of the schoolmaster
